text.welcomeSubtitle: This is a modern management system built with Vue 3 + TypeScript + Element Plus
text.systemManagementDesc: Provide menu management, system logs and system configuration functions
text.userManagementDesc: Support user list viewing and role management functions
text.dataAnalysisDesc: Provide data overview and detailed analysis functions
text.systemAlertDesc: You can navigate to different functional modules through the left menu bar. If you have any questions, please contact the system administrator.
